name: Araby.com
tag_list: search-engines, arabic-search-engines, music-search, video-search, araby, music, islam, video
overview:
Araby.com is the first Arabic search engine launched by Maktoob Group in 2006.

Araby.com is the first Arabic search engine on the internet offering advanced Arabic-language search capabilities and the latest, comprehensive, and more accurate coverage of the Arabic websites, to users worldwide; relying on the latest search and indexing technologies and the expertise of distinguished technology and language experts.

As a user-focused service, Araby provides a tool to search through specific verticals such as Videos, music, forums, Islam, blogs, and images, packed with a host of attractive features that include Advanced Search, the Arabic keyboard and Search by Click. The continuous efforts at Araby to offer a better service are shaping a new search experience in which the user needs are better understood and served in an intuitive and effective way.
